about_the_game:
This is a summer -filled VR table tennis game, allowing players to feel the charm of beach table tennis on the hot summer day. The background of the game is set on a beautiful beach, the sun is sprinkled on the golden beach, and the waves patted the shore gently, giving a quiet and comfortable feeling.



Players will play a fierce table tennis game with the robotic arm on the beach. The rules of the game adopt a 7 -point system, and the first side of 7 points is the winner of the game. The game designed three different difficulty factor for players to choose from. During the game, players need to control the handle to flexibly use the virtual table tennis racket in their hands. While hitting the ball in a timely manner, pay attention to the accuracy of the ball.
During the game, in order to increase the fun and sense of participation in the game, the beach beauty also set up a beach beauty to cheer for players. They are wearing a beautiful bikini, standing on the sidelines to cheer for players, creating a relaxed and happy atmosphere. Players can not only enjoy the intense stimulus of fierce confrontation with the robotic arm, but also enjoy the beautiful beach scenery and charming beauty figure, so that the entire game is full of summer vitality and joy.
In short, this is a beach VR game that allows players to experience the fun of table tennis in summer. Come and participate in this summer table tennis war, release your enthusiasm, show your skills!



Operation method:
Adjust height Left/right handle up/down
Reset position Left/right handle grip
Pause Left/right handle menu

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G4560 / AMD FX 8300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
  • VR Support: HTC VIVE
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or higher
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio
  • VR Support: HTC VIVE

short_description: This is a summer -filled VR table tennis game, allowing players to feel the charm of beach table tennis on the hot summer day. The background of the game is set on a beautiful and golden beach. The waves patted the shore gently, giving a quiet and comfortable feeling.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
